description: The Art System serves as the 'Pok√©dex' of Atlantis Go, allowing users to collect, categorize, practice, and master different types of human creative endeavors.

key_models.name: Art
key_models.description: Base model representing a creative practice that can be learned and mastered

relationships.description: Arts that are prerequisites or related to this art
Components or aspects of an art that must be practiced
Different learning stages for an art

key_models.intent: Model the concept of a learnable creative practice or skill

key_models.name: ArtParts
key_models.description: Components or aspects of an art that must be practiced and mastered

relationships.description: The art this part belongs to

key_models.intent: Break down the learning process for an art into concrete parts

key_models.name: ArtMastery
key_models.description: Tracks a user's mastery of a specific art

relationships.description: The user whose mastery is being tracked
The currently active part being practiced

key_models.intent: Track user progress in mastering an art over time

key_models.name: ArtStage
key_models.description: Represents different learning stages for an art

relationships.description: The art this stage belongs to

key_models.intent: Define the progression path within an art from novice to mastery

key_models.name: UserArtStageProgress
key_models.description: Tracks a user's progress through art stages

relationships.description: The user whose progress is being tracked

key_models.intent: Track progress within stages of an art's mastery path

key_models.name: ArtTaxonomy
key_models.intent: Organize arts into a hierarchical classification system

key_models.name: TechTree

relationships.description: Arts required to unlock this tech tree node
Arts unlocked by this tech tree node

key_models.intent: Define the progression and dependency relationships between arts

key_models.name: UserTechTreeProgress
key_models.description: Tracks a user's progress through the tech tree

relationships.description: The user whose progress is being tracked
The tech tree node being tracked

key_models.intent: Track user progress in unlocking tech tree nodes

semantic_relationships.description: The Art System implements a progression system where users discover arts, practice them through parts, advance through stages, and unlock new arts via the tech tree.
Arts are organized in a taxonomic hierarchy for categorization and discovery.
User progress, mastery, and achievements are tracked across multiple models.
The system implements game mechanics including unlocking, progression, achievements, and rewards.

implementation_status: Missing - The Art System is completely missing from the current EudaimoniaGo implementation and needs to be created from scratch.
dependency_on_core_user_system: The Art System depends on the User model from the Core User System to track user progress and mastery.
